cheeses.title: Greenfields – Cow's Milk
cheeses.description:
JRaw cow’s milk cheese with flavor notes of a Gruyère crossed with a mild Gouda. Slightly tangy and semi-firm in texture.
Recommended Companions: Spiced almonds, dried cranberries, Classic White Potter’s Crackers, Merlot wine.

cheeses.title: Hook's Five-Year Cheddar – Cow's Milk
cheeses.description:
Cow’s milk, firm & traditional orange.Aged five years. Soft but still crumbly. A great well-rounded cheddar, milder than it’s 8, 10, or 12-year cousins.
Recommended Companions: Dried cherries, Classic White Potter’s Crackers, Merlot wine, Ale Asylum Hopalicious ale.

cheeses.title: Red Rock – Cow’s Milk
cheeses.description:
Pasteurized cow’s milk combines the creaminess of an American-style cheddar with the bite and tang of a French blue cheese. Open-air cured, cave-aged, and light blue veining.
Recommended Companions: Dried cranberries, Quince & Apple Fig and Black Tea preserves, Classic Wheat Potter’s Crackers, Ale Asylum Contorter Porter ale.

cheeses.title: Expresso BellaVitano – Cow's Milk
cheeses.description:
This cheese won 3rd place at the 2013 American Cheese Society awards. It is created by hand-rubbing freshly ground expresso into wheels of sweet, creamy BellaVitano cheese. Wake up and…eat the cheese!
Recommended Companion: Gail Ambrosius Salted Caramels.

cheeses.title: Evalon – Goat’s Milk
cheeses.description:
Raw goat’s milk gouda. Supple, smooth, sweet, aged over 70 days. Best in Show winner at the U.S. Championship Cheese Contest in 2011. Slighty floral flavors.
Recommended Companions: Dried cherries, Quince & Apple Pear with Honey and Ginger preserves, Sauvignon Blanc wine, New Glarus Spotted Cow ale.

cheeses.title: Driftless Plain – Sheep’s Milk
cheeses.description:
Award-winning fresh, hand-ladled sheep/’s milk cheese. Sold individually in 5 oz. sealed containers. Lovely soft, whipped texture. This version is the plain, unadulterated sheep/’s milk variety.
Recommended Companions: Classic White Potter/’s Crackers, Quince & Apple Cranberry Relish preserves, Pinot Gris wine.

cheeses.title: Black Sheep Truffle – Sheep’s Milk
cheeses.location: Carr Valley Cheese, La Valle, Wisconsin.
cheeses.description:
Inspired by the truffled cheese of Italy, this award winning sheep/’s milk cheese is washed in truffle oil and aged over 6 months. It has a sweet unique earthy flavor from the black truffle pieces throughout the cheese.
It was awarded 1st Place at the 2011 U.S. Championship Cheese Contest and 1st Place at the 2012 World Championship Cheese Contest.
Recommended Companions: Fromagination spiced almonds or Treat spiced pecans.

cheeses.title: Ewe Calf To Be Kidding Blue – Mixed Milk
cheeses.description: This one is Hook's newest mlxed-milk blue cheese!  And it won 2nd place from the American Cheese Society in 2013 in the “Mixed Milk Blue Cheese” category because…it is made from the milk of cows, goats and sheep!  Tony Hook, co-founder of Hook’s Cheese, said, “I thought of the name two years ago and then it took me that long to get the cheese right.”

cheeses.title: Mobay – Sheep & Goat's Milk
cheeses.location: Carr Valley Cheese Co., LaValle, Wisconsin.
cheeses.description:
This whimsical take on the famous French cheese, Morbier, this variety eatures a layer of sheep’s milk cheese and a layer of goat’s milk cheese separated by a line of grapevine ash. Both delicate and rustic. Taste each layer separately and then together for three different flavor profiles in one great cheese.
Recommended Companions: Dried apricots, Quince & Apple Pear with Honey and Ginger preserves, dry white wine.

cheeses.title: Marieke Aged Gouda – Cow’s Milk
cheeses.description:
This aged Gouda is aged 9 to 12 months, and handcrafted in a traditional Dutch style using fresh, raw, cow’s milk. This is an award-winning cheese, nutty and slightly crystalized with deep, nuanced flavors.
Recommended Companions: Merlot wine, maple syrup, Wisconsin dried cranberries, Potter’s classic wheat crackers.

cheeses.title: GranQueso Reserve – Cow/’s Milk
cheeses.description:
GranQueso Reserve is aged for 15 months or more, so that each bite offers a dense texture with crystallization and a concentration of exquisite flavors. This special cheese won 1st place from the American Cheese Society in 2012.
Recommended Companions: A bold, fruity red wine; spiced pecans or almonds; and Potter’s Wheat Crackers.

cheeses.title: Vintage Van Gogh – Cow's Milk
cheeses.description:
Full-cream gouda, aged a minimum of 6 months. Rich and creamy flavor with caramel and coffee notes.
Recommended Companions: Dried cranberries or cherries, dark chocolate, Pinot Noir wine, Bock beer.
